items.importQuestion: Can I import my existing menu?
items.importAnswer: Yes! Upload a PDF, photo, or paste a link to your current menu. Our AI extracts all items, descriptions, and prices automatically.
items.allergensAnswer: Add dietary tags like Vegan, Gluten-free, Halal, and more to any item. Tags are automatically translated and displayed in the customer's language.

items.whatIsQuestion: What is a QR code menu?
items.whatIsAnswer: A QR code menu is a digital menu that customers can access by scanning a QR code with their smartphone. No app download required - the menu opens instantly in any browser.
items.languagesAnswer: Digifoodz supports automatic translation to 30+ languages including English, Spanish, French, German, Chinese, Japanese, Arabic, and more. Your menu auto-detects the customer's device language.
items.updateQuestion: Can I update my menu in real-time?
items.updateAnswer: Yes! Changes you make are instantly reflected on the digital menu. No need to reprint QR codes - they stay the same forever.
items.printQuestion: Do I need to reprint QR codes when I update prices?
items.printAnswer: Never. Your QR code is permanent. Update prices, add items, change descriptions - all updates appear instantly without reprinting.
items.costQuestion: How much does a QR menu cost?

whatMakesGood.title: What Makes a Good Pizza Menu Design?
whatMakesGood.content:
A well-designed pizza menu does more than list your offerings—it guides customers through your specialty pizzas, builds excitement, and increases order values. The best pizza menus organize items logically, starting with appetizers and salads, then moving to classic pizzas, specialty creations, and build-your-own options.

High-quality food photography is essential for pizza menus. Customers want to see the golden crust, melted cheese, and fresh toppings. Clear descriptions that highlight unique ingredients and flavor combinations help customers make confident choices. Including size options and pricing for each pizza variety makes ordering straightforward.

rightStructure.title: The Right Structure for Your Pizza Menu
rightStructure.content:

items.commitmentAnswer: Longer commitments give you better pricing. A 1-year commitment saves 43% compared to monthly billing. You can choose the plan that works best for your budget.
items.changeTierQuestion: Can I change my credit tier or commitment?
items.changeTierAnswer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your AI credit tier anytime from your dashboard. Commitment changes apply to your next billing cycle.
items.cancelAnswer: Yes. No long-term contracts. Cancel your subscription with one click from your dashboard.

importProcessing.feature1Desc: Changed your prices? Out of avocado? Update the menu, and it's live instantly. No need to reprint the QR code.
importProcessing.feature2Desc: Breakfast menu at 8 AM, Dinner menu at 6 PM. Automatically switch menus based on time and day.
importProcessing.feature3Desc: Update once, publish everywhere. Sync your menu to Google, Facebook, Instagram, and your website instantly.
importProcessing.feature4Title: Make Every Guest Feel Like a Local
importProcessing.feature4Desc: Your menu detects their phone's language and adapts instantly. A Japanese guest in your Italian trattoria reads the menu in Japanese.
importProcessing.timeoutSubtitle: The extraction took longer than expected. This can happen for several reasons:
importProcessing.timeoutReason1: File is too large — try a smaller file (under 10MB)
importProcessing.timeoutReason2: Complex menu layout — try a cleaner PDF or single-page image
importProcessing.timeoutReason3: Low image quality — use a clearer, well-lit photo
importProcessing.timeoutReason4: Server is temporarily busy — please try again in a moment
importProcessing.timeoutTip: Tip: For best results, upload a clear PDF or a well-lit photo of your menu.
